thread.title: Panerai Presents the Gorgeous New Luminor Submersible 1950 3 Days Automatic Oro Rosso
thread.title_full: Panerai Presents the Gorgeous New Luminor Submersible 1950 3 Days Automatic Oro Rosso

author: David Fischer
title: Panerai Presents the Gorgeous New Luminor Submersible 1950 3 Days Automatic Oro Rosso
text:
Visit the original post to see all 3 images from this gallery. 
There are several things that we love about Paneraiâ€™s latest released. The luxury watch brand just presented some of its most iconic watches in new precious metal options and the above Luminor Submersible 1950 3 Days Automatic Oro Rosso is our absolute favorite. We have always been fans of the combination of rose gold and black rubber straps, furthermore we also like the smaller 42mm case size on this particular watch, when Panerai is best known for its bigger watches. This is a both elegant and sporty looking alternative to others in the market and the perfect summer watch.
